company: INBIFO Institut fur biologische Forschung GmbH

message.subject: European Contract Research Laboratories
message.body: Dear Gerry: Hans-Jurgen asked me to provide him with a list of the 5 top contract labs in Europe for Ed Carmines. I think the following institutions fall into that category. Please note that Huntingdon at the moment has some problems with GLP and animal protection. Kind regards, 2505431280
